short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight script to gather smart statistical data. Used with the LabStats client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LabStats Website Application Tracking Extension for Chrome is a lightweight script that works in concert with the LabStats client to gather smart statistical data about applications run in the browser. This extension allows school administrators and lab managers to track and report on the use of select web applications in the Chrome browser on school-owned computers and devices.  

The LabStats software provides a simple cloud-based solution for measuring technology usage in computer labs. Customizable reports make visualizing usage data quick and easy.

Do you ever wonder which computers are being used the most/least?
Do you think you may be paying for software licenses that arenâ€™t actually being used?
Do you wish you could back up funding requests with hard numbers and prove that your hardware and software resources are being fully utilized?
LabStats delivers the insights you need to cut excess spending and focus resources in the areas students need them most. Why make large investments in technology without a way to measure its effectiveness?

For more information about LabStats, please visit https://labstats.com.
For our privacy policy, please visit https://labstats.com/privacy.
